title: Does anyone want to start a band in India? If so, please join me and I am a 13-year-old girl. I am very good at dancing and singing. - Quora

response.answer_text: Hey dear I am 14years …I also wanna start a band …iam also good in dancing and singing .. please tell what should we do for further process…and ya please reply to my answer as it would help me to know that you are interested in forming a band Thanks 😊
We are 2 girls (age of 13 and 15) and interested in making band we are good at singing and dancing and little intrested in rapping can you please help us and contact us through insta I'd:-(@RV_735)
